entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:41 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
